Title: WPWS prompt
Description: In the year 2100, in a future you would like to live in,

Title: Growth
Description: In a 'growth' future -- in which 'progress' has continued,

Title: Collapse
Description: In a 'collapse' future -- in which society as we know it has come apart,

Title: Discipline
Description: In a 'discipline' future -- in which order is deliberately coordinated or imposed,

Title: Transformation
Description: In a 'transformation' future -- in which a profound historical evolution has occurred,

Title: wildcard
Description: a topic or location of your choice
